Author: Timothy Bish <tabish121@gmail.com>
Date: 08/10/2015 06:39:31
Message:
QPIDJMS-116 Attempt to fix the sporadic test failure of timed received after connection drop.  On connection loss the session is shutdown which first stops itself and its consumers before in turn shutting down the consumers and setting a failure cause.  This can result in the consumer dequeue from the prefetch buffer returning but not having a set failure cause yet and then return null because it has subsequently been shutdown. #MsgLength=431
